title: Z-Boys refers to the original riders for the Zephyr Skate Team. They are widely credited with inspiring the contemporary skateboard subculture. They integrated the sport with aggressive, surf-influenced movements, and they cultivated a brash, anti-establishment attitude in their public presentations. The Z-Boys are perhaps most famous for illegally skating in drained backyard pools
